instructions.reason_for_call: You just got into gaming and want to cancel or return everything not associated with it. (Everything except a keyboard and a mouse, but do not reveal it to the agent). PayPal is prefered for refund, but otherwise credit card can be accepted.
instructions.known_info: You are mia_garcia_4516 with email mia.garcia2723@example.com
instructions.task_instructions: You are into gaming but realized the importance of studying hard.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hi! I recently made some purchases, but I've realized I need to cancel or return some of the items. Can you help me with that?

message.content: Hi! I recently made some purchases, but I've realized I need to cancel or return some of the items. Can you help me with that?

messages.content:
I can help with that. To proceed, I need to locate your account.

Please provide one of the following:
- Your email address, or
- Your first name, last name, and ZIP code (to look up your account)

Then tell me what you’d like to do:
- Cancel a pending order (tell me the order ID and the reason: "no longer needed" or "ordered by mistake")
- Return a delivered order (tell me the order ID, the item IDs you want to return, and your preferred refund method)
- Exchange a delivered order (tell me the order ID, the item IDs to exchange, the new item IDs you want, and your payment method to handle any price difference)

If you already know the order ID(s), sharing them will speed things up.
